meanings.definition: A project that is part of a larger project.
meanings.sent1: The subprojects included designing the logo and creating the website.
meanings.sent2: The team worked on various subprojects to complete the main project on time.
meanings.sent3: The subprojects were like puzzle pieces coming together to form the big picture.
meanings.sent4: Each subproject was a building block contributing to the success of the entire project.
meanings.sent5: The subprojects added depth and complexity to the overall project.

meanings.definition: To divide a project into smaller tasks or components.
meanings.sent1: She subprojects the assignment to make it more manageable.
meanings.sent2: Subprojecting the work helped them stay organized and focused.
meanings.sent3: He subprojects his chores to finish them faster.
meanings.sent4: Subprojecting the research allowed them to tackle each part systematically.
meanings.sent5: They decided to subproject the renovation project for better efficiency.
